bibl.title: Syncretism, based on Papers read at the Symposium on Cultural Contact, Meeting of religions, Syncretism held at Åbo on the 8th - 10th of September, 1966
bibl.note: Bergman Jan, Beitrag zur Interpretatio graeca. Ägyptische Götter in griechischer Übertragung.

Syncretism, based on Papers read at the Symposium on Cultural Contact, Meeting of religions, Syncretism held at Åbo on the 8th - 10th of September, 1966 = Scripta Instituti Donneriani Aboensis. III (Stockholm, 1969) pp. 207-227.
